DOC.brief_title: Safety Study IHL-305 ( Irinotecan Liposome Injection ) Treat Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase I dose-escalation study intravenous administration IHL-305 patient advance solid tumor . Patients receive IHL-305 intravenous infusion 60 minute Day 1 follow 27-day observation period total 28 day ( 4 week ) per cycle . Two patient population evaluate separately ; patient UGT1A1*28 genotype homozygous wild-type ( wt/wt ) heterozygous ( wt/*28 ) variants one group , patient UGT1A1*28 homozygous variant ( *28/*28 ) another group .
